resources.string: This is a really long chunck of text that will be replaced, never to be seen again, when a JokeView is added to the list.

string-array.name: jokeList
string-array.item: A small boy swallowed some coins and was taken to the hospital. When his grandmother telephoned to ask how he was a nurse said, \'No change yet.\'
Cartoonist found dead in home. Details are sketchy.
I wondered why the baseball was getting bigger. Then it hit me.
Why was six afraid of seven? Because seven eight nine.
